FLa4a
  • Reference
  • Articles

compute log-correlation matrix

Method to compute the log-correlation matrix for the first dimension (quant) of the FLQuant object.

getAcor(object, ...)

# S4 method for FLQuant
getAcor(object, ...)

Arguments

object
object of relevant class (see signature of method)
...
additional argument list that might never be used

Value

an FLQuant object with a quant log-correlation matrix

Examples

data(ple4)
getAcor(harvest(ple4))
#>             1         2         3         4          5         6         7
#> 1  1.00000000 0.3406242 0.2244260 0.2287743 0.09189027 0.2404206 0.2195695
#> 2  0.34062421 1.0000000 0.8937023 0.7404885 0.75446841 0.7570091 0.7570275
#> 3  0.22442604 0.8937023 1.0000000 0.8476852 0.83072881 0.7766917 0.7862153
#> 4  0.22877427 0.7404885 0.8476852 1.0000000 0.83924049 0.8206510 0.7975876
#> 5  0.09189027 0.7544684 0.8307288 0.8392405 1.00000000 0.8065810 0.8005318
#> 6  0.24042058 0.7570091 0.7766917 0.8206510 0.80658096 1.0000000 0.8248057
#> 7  0.21956945 0.7570275 0.7862153 0.7975876 0.80053179 0.8248057 1.0000000
#> 8  0.24928084 0.7681883 0.7307057 0.7361278 0.74530602 0.7796651 0.7710364
